name: The key doesn't work anymore
description: Use the directional arrows to interact. Some items have more than one interaction There are currently two endings based on if you pick up a particular object before leaving or not. This is a Bitsy project for class on the subject of memories. What's left behind, what we expel, what gives an object the power of a memory? Prose and bits to explore here. Your thoughts are valuable, if you'd care to leave a comment
